$$
Zr_i = \beta_0 +  \textit{County}_{k[i]} + \textit{State_code}_{j[i]} + \textit{Effect_size}_{i} 
$$



$$
\textit{County}_{k} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_{country}^{2}), ~~ \textit{State_code}_{j} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_{state_code}^{2}), ~~\& ~~ \textit{Effect_size}_{i} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_{effect_size}^{2})
$$



$$
Zr_i = \beta_0 + beta_1 * z(ln(checklist duration))_i + \text{} \textit{County}_{k[i]} + \textit{State_code}_{j[i]} +\textit{Effect_size}_{i} 
$$
